characters.name: Butterbean
characters.message: Hi! I'm Butterbean. Sometimes when I use my phone, I get a little confused because I’m not sure what I can share and what I shouldn’t share.
characters.msg_phone: I'm chatting in a group. Someone I don’t know is in the chat. Should I tell them this?
